scripts.run:next-js: yarn install:next-js && yarn build:next-js && yarn start:next-js
scripts.run:next-ts: yarn install:next-ts && yarn build:next-ts && yarn start:next-ts
scripts.run:node: cd node && yarn build:ts && yarn run:js && yarn run:mjs && yarn run:ts && yarn run:ts-node

scripts.run:parcel-ts: yarn install:parcel-ts && yarn build:parcel-ts && yarn start:parcel-ts
scripts.run:webpack-js: yarn install:webpack-js && yarn build:webpack-js && yarn start:webpack-js
scripts.run:webpack-ts: yarn install:webpack-ts && yarn build:webpack-ts && yarn start:webpack-ts

scripts.run:vite-ts: yarn install:vite-ts && yarn build:vite-ts && yarn start:vite-ts
